pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena devadatto parihīnalābhasakkāro sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.5_0: Kassa sampannaṁ na manāpaṁ, kassa sāduṁ na ruccatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.6_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma devadatto sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.16_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena manussā gilāne bhikkhū bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:2.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:2.9_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvaradānasamaye sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyādetvā bhikkhū nimantenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:3.10_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvarakārake bhikkhū bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:4.8_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū manussehi saddhiṁ addhānaṁ gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.2_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.6_0: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti—“paṭikkhittaṁ bhagavatā gaṇabhojanan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.12_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū manussehi saddhiṁ nāvāya gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.2_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṁ—“muhuttaṁ, āvuso, tīraṁ upanetha; piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.4_0: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti—“paṭikkhittaṁ bhagavatā gaṇabhojanan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.9_0: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.10_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhū rājagahaṁ āgacchanti bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.2_0: Manussā nānāverajjake bhikkhū passitvā bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.8_0: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.9_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa ñātisālohito ājīvakesu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.1_1: Atha kho so ājīvako yena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.1_2: upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ etadavoca—“icchāmahaṁ, mahārāja,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.4_0: Atha kho so ājīvako bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pāhesi—“adhivāsentu me bhikkhū svātanāya bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.6_0: Atha kho so ājīvako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.6_2: sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.6_3: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho so ājīvako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.9_0: Adhivāsetu me bhavaṁ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.11_0: Atha kho so ājīvako bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.12_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.16_0: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.2_0: yattha cattāro bhikkhū pañcannaṁ bhojanānaṁ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjanti. Etaṁ gaṇabhojanaṁ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.8_0: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañcamāsā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.12_0: “addhayojanaṁ gacchissāmī”ti bhuñjitabbaṁ, gacchantena bhuñjitabbaṁ, gatena bhuñjitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.14_0: “nāvaṁ abhiruhissāmī”ti bhuñjitabbaṁ, āruḷhena bhuñjitabbaṁ, oruḷhena bhuñjitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.16_0: yattha dve tayo bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā yāpenti, catutthe āgate na yāpenti. “Mahāsamayo”ti bhuñjitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.2.1_0: Gaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.2.2_0: Gaṇabhojane vematiko, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.2.3_0: Gaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
